contact.group: Lions Eye Institute, Nedlands, Western Australia, Australia

publications.title: Generation of two induced pluripotent stem cell lines from a patient with dominant PRPF31 mutation and a related non-penetrant carrier

donor.disease_description: Retinitis pigmentosa caused by dominant nonsense mutation in PRPF31 gene

genomic_modifications.description: Dominant nonsense mutation in PRPF31 gene (NM_015629.3:c.1205C > A p.(Ser402Ter))

genomic_characterisation.summary: Digital karyotyping and CNV analysis demonstrated normal karyotype with no genomic alterations greater than 500 kb.
genomic_characterisation.karyotype_method: Digital karyotyping by Illumina SNP Beadchip

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: Episomal iPSC Reprogramming Plasmid kit (SC900A-1, System Biosciences)

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Western Australia Human Research Ethics Committee
